p: From 1997 to 2007 we captured 118 weasels, including 23 of M. n. vulgaris. Analysis of the live-trapping data showed a significant positive relationship between the summer-autumn share of M. n. nivalis in the weasel population inhabiting the study area and the number of days with snow cover during the preceding winter (LM, F 1,4 = 23.93, R 2 = 0.82, p < 0.01, Fig. 1).
